narration: A Businessman is sitting down, eating.
dialogs: You approach the Businessman. He says: 'It's such a nice day today. I'm glad I decided to eat lunch outside, but I'm stump on this puzzle. Care to take a look?'
Yep. It sure is tough. Want another stab at it?
Sorry sir, I don't think that is the right answer.
Wow, I think that's the answer. Here, it seems like this could be of some value to you.
I have to finish eating and get back to work. It seems like chewing takes forever.
